title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)

what:
Get the probability that an event was generated by a normal distribution
given the alternative is a t-distribution with given degrees of freedom. — draw_lln_with_func_facet
title:
Get the probability that an event was generated by a normal distribution
given the alternative is a t-distribution with given degrees of freedom. — draw_lln_with_func_facet
text: Get probability event generated normal distribution given alternative t-distribution given degrees freedom.

title:

given the alternative is a t-distribution with given degrees of freedom. — draw_lln_with_func_facet

text: n prior probability event generated normal distribution mean_of_func Z-score event, .e., number standard deviations away mean random_function degrees freedom t-distribution ... Additional arguments pass random function
